statetracker.help: combination of different filters you can use to track states, lowest energy state that fits all filters is chosen

oscillatorstrength.help: picks first state above a threshold

localisation.help: picks first state which is localized (occupation above a threshild) on the fragment

fragment.help: Fragment definiton using atomids, can be a combination of ids and ranges of ids e.g. 1:5

threshold.help: Threshold above which a state is considered localized

chargetransfer.help: picks first state which exhibits CT character on the fragment

fragment.help: Fragment definiton using atomids, can be a combination of ids and ranges of ids e.g. 1:5

threshold.help: Threshold above which a state is considered a CT state

density.help: Tracks state by comparing the density to an earlier state, you have to specify a minimum threshold, which can be zero

overlap.help: Tracks state by calculating the overlap with an earlier state, you have to specify a minimum threshold, which can be zero
